data.text: @EmbassyGuyana I'm an American citizen so I will be camping outside the US embassy with my kids and begging for money to be able to eat until this situation is resolved and my kids get the visa and we can continue with our lives

@EmbassyGuyana I'm an American citizen so I will be camping outside the US embassy with my kids and begging for money to be able to eat until this situation is resolved and my kids get the visa and we can continue with our lives.

@EmbassyGuyana My savings are running out, all I have left is to pay for food and lodging for two more weeks. In two weeks i will be with my kids on the streets of guyana like some more homeless people because i have no job and no one to help me with the expenses.

@EmbassyGuyana My kids traveled from Cuba to Guyana for their visa interview at the US embassy. After their interview, the consul determined that my kids needed to fill out form ds 5535. My Kids have already lost their ticket back to Cuba.
